bibl.seg: EGBERTS A., B.P. MUHS and J. VAN DER VLIET (Edd.), Perspectives on Panopolis: An Egyptian Town from Alexander the Great to the Arab Conquest. Acts from an International Symposium Held in Leiden on 16, 17 and 18 December 1998. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXXI.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2002, 4°, xix-273 pp., tabl., fac-sim., figg., plans et 9 pll. ISBN 90-04-11753-9. €119.
17 communications. - Pp. vii-xii: J. V.D.V., Preface; - 261-273: Indices.
C.R. par Didier Devauchelle, BibO 61 (2004) coll. 91-95. - Frank Feder, ArchPF 49 (2003) pp. 255-262. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 83 (2003 [2006]) pp. 314-315.
